SCRIPT.MSCRI:
: DEFINE &STRING_ARR#, string, 30 : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_HEADER
:INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH
!-------------------------------------logging input parameters----------------------------->
: INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.PARAM_VALIDATION : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "REST API Url" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_CA_APM_URL#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Vertex Id" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_CA_APM_TRANS_IDS#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Attribute Name" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_CA_APM_ATTR_NAME#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Attribute Value" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_CA_APM_ATTR_VALUE#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
: INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION
!------------------------------------------ Error Handling -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "******** ADD CUSTOM ATTRIBUTE ACTION EXECUTED SUCCESSFULLY ********" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "******** ADD CUSTOM ATTRIBUTE ACTION EXECUTION FAILED ********"
!----------------------------preparing add custom attribute command ----------------------------------- :DEFINE &CA_APM_VERTEX_IDS#, string, 90
:FILL &CA_APM_VERTEX_IDS#[] = STR_SPLIT(&UC4RB_CA_APM_TRANS_IDS#,",")
:SET &VAR# = 1 :SET &VERTEX_IDS_LEN# = LENGTH(&CA_APM_VERTEX_IDS#[],SIZE) :SET &UC4RB_CA_APM_VERTEX# = ""
:WHILE &VAR# LT &VERTEX_IDS_LEN# : SET &VAR# = FORMAT(&VAR#,"0") : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &CA_APM_VERTEX_IDS#[&VAR#] : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_APM.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE@UNIX : SET &UC4RB_CA_APM_VERTEX# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_CA_APM_VERTEX#,&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#) : SET &UC4RB_CA_APM_VERTEX# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_CA_APM_VERTEX#,',') : SET &VAR# = &VAR#+ 1 :ENDWHILE
: SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &CA_APM_VERTEX_IDS#[&VERTEX_IDS_LEN#] : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_APM.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE@UNIX : SET &UC4RB_CA_APM_VERTEX# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_CA_APM_VERTEX#,&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#)
: SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_CA_APM_ATTR_NAME# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_APM.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE@UNIX : SET &UC4RB_CA_APM_ATT_NAME# = &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#
: SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_CA_APM_ATTR_VALUE# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_APM.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE@UNIX : SET &UC4RB_CA_APM_ATT_VALUE# = &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#
!creating json object :set &JSON# = " {" :SET &JSON# = STR_CAT(&JSON#,'"vertexIds":[') :SET &JSON# = STR_CAT(&JSON#,'&UC4RB_CA_APM_VERTEX#') :SET &JSON# = STR_CAT(&JSON#,"],") :SET &JSON# = STR_CAT(&JSON#,'"attributeName":&UC4RB_CA_APM_ATT_NAME#') :SET &JSON# = STR_CAT(&JSON#,',"attributeValue":&UC4RB_CA_APM_ATT_VALUE#') :SET &JSON# = STR_CAT(&JSON#,"}")
:SET &UC4RB_JSON_FILE# = "attributeJSON-&$RUNID#.txt" :SET &AGENT_TEMPDIR# = GET_VAR('UC_EX_PATH_TEMP', &AGENT#) :SET &UC4RB_JSON_FILE_PATH# = STR_CAT(&AGENT_TEMPDIR#,"&UC4RB_JSON_FILE#") :SET &HND# = CREATE_PROCESS(NEW) :SET &RET# = PUT_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#, &JSON#) :SET &RET# = WRITE_PROCESS(&HND#, &UC4RB_JSON_FILE_PATH# ,&AGENT#,&LOGIN#,OVERWRITE) :IF &RET# <> 0 : PRINT "Error in writing file to path : &UC4RB_JSON_FILE_PATH#" :ENDIF :CLOSE_PROCESS &HND#
!creating curl command :SET &UC4RB_CA_APM_CMD# = "curl -s -X POST --data-binary " :SET &UC4RB_CA_APM_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_CA_APM_CMD#,'"@&UC4RB_JSON_FILE_PATH#"') :SET &UC4RB_CA_APM_ESCAPE_STRING# = "&UC4RB_CA_APM_URL#" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_APM.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE@UNIX
:SET &UC4RB_CA_APM_URL# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_CA_APM_URL#,"/apm/appmap/private/attributes/assign") :SET &UC4RB_CA_APM_URL# = STR_CAT('"',&UC4RB_CA_APM_URL#) :SET &UC4RB_CA_APM_URL# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_CA_APM_URL#,'"') :SET &UC4RB_CA_APM_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_CA_APM_CMD# , " &UC4RB_CA_APM_URL#")
:SET &UC4RB_CA_APM_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_CA_APM_CMD#,' --header "Content-Type:application/json"')
! token : SET &UC4RB_ENCRYPTED_PASSWORD_TMP# = "&UC4RB_CA_APM_TOKEN#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.DECRYPT_PASSWORD : SET &UC4RB_CA_APM_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_CA_APM_CMD#, ' --header "Authorization: Bearer $UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD "')
:PRINT &UC4RB_CA_APM_CMD# response=`&UC4RB_CA_APM_CMD#` echo "UC4RB_JSON_RESPONSE::=$response" rm &UC4RB_JSON_FILE_PATH#
!---------------------------CHECK JOB STATUS-------------------------------- :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_APM.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_JOBSTATUS@UNIX :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_FOOTER
